str2: And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From para and kaleo; to call near, i.e. Invite, invoke.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From meta and didomi; to give over, i.e. Share.
Simplicity, sincerity, purity, graciousness. From haplous; singleness, i.e. sincerity, or generosity.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From pro and histemi; to stand before, i.e. to preside, or to practise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
(a) speed, haste, (b) diligence, earnestness, enthusiasm. From speudo; 'speed', i.e. despatch, eagerness, earnestness.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To pity, have mercy on. From eleos; to compassionate.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
